58969.遊びにいきたい家の\nテーマを選択してください。\n<break>:
Please select the theme of the kind of house
you want to visit.
<break>

58970.『他の人の家へ』を使えば この大陸の住宅村で\nウェルカムハウス設定にしている誰:
With "Visit Other People's Homes," you can jump right in front of anyone's house that's set up as a welcome home in any residential
village on this continent! However, you'll never know which house you're going to... The location you go to will change every time, so
try it again and again to visit different houses...

58971.今この住宅村には\nウェルカムハウスが まだ１軒もないようです。\nしばらくした:
Right now, there's not a single welcome house
in this residential village... Try again in a
while...

60579.「現在 この家は ウェルカムハウスに\n 設定されています。\n ウェルカムハウ:
This house is currently set up as a welcome
home... Would you like to stop setting the
house as a welcome home?<yesno><break>

60580.「現在 この家は ウェルカムハウスに\n 設定されていません。\n ウェルカムハ:
This house is currently set up as a welcome
home. Have you ever heard of a welcome home?<yesno><break>

60581.「『家への出入り』を『だれでもＯＫ』にしたので\n この家を ウェルカムハウスに:
Now that we've set access to the house to "open to all," we can make this house a welcome home... Do you know what a welcome
house is?

60582.「では この家を\n ウェルカムハウスに 設定しますか？\n<yesno><br:
So, would you like to set up this house as a
welcome home?<yesno><break>

60583.「ウェルカムハウス設定を やめました。\n 『他の人の家へ』の検索対象からはずれ:
Stop setting up welcome house... No longer
searching for "Other People's Houses"...<bw_break>

60584.「はい。この家を\n <%sL_CATEGORY> の\n ウェルカムハウスに:
Yes. We'll set this house as the welcome
house for <%sL_CATEGORY>...<bw_break>

60585.「これより『家への出入り』が できるのは\n 『だれでもＯＫ』になりました。\n:
From now on, access to the house will be open
to anyone...<bw_break>

60586.「ウェルカムハウスに 設定すると\n たくさんの人が この家を見つけて\n 遊び:
If you set up a welcome house, a lot of people might find this house and come to visit... In the welcome house, you can set up
points of self-confidence in your house, and for each self-confidence point you set up, you can select the house you want to fly
to... The welcome house can be accessed from the door menu, and balloons will be placed on the sign outside the house so that other
people can easily recognize it. If you set your house as a welcome house, it will automatically be open to everyone, so be
careful when setting permissions on furniture...

60587.「では 説明します。ウェルカムハウスに\n 設定すると たくさんの人が この家を:
Let me explain. If you set up a welcome house, many people may find this house and come to visit... In the welcome house, you
can set up points of self-confidence in your house, and for each self-confidence point you set up, you can select the house you want to
fly to... The welcome house can be accessed from the door menu, and balloons will be placed on the sign outside the house so that
other people can easily recognize it... I'm not sure if this is a good idea or not, but it's a good idea.

60736.「<%sL_CATEGORY>に\n 設定してよろしいですか？\n<yesno>:
Are you sure you want to set it to
<%sL_CATEGORY>?<yesno><break>

60738.「どのカテゴリに 設定しますか？\n<break>: Which category do you want to set?<break>

61117.<%sL_CATEGORY>の\nウェルカムハウスに 遊びに行きますか？\n<y:
Would you like to visit the Welcome House in
<%sL_CATEGORY>?<yesno><break>

There are currently <%nL_WELCOME_NUM> houses
set as welcome houses...<bw_break>

<select_se_off>
Category settings

247174.「『マイタウンへの出入り』を『だれでもＯＫ』に\n したので ウェルカムハウスに:
Now that I've set "Access to My Town" to
"Open to All," I can set the Welcome House
to... Do you know what a Welcome House is?<yesno><break>

247175.「では このマイタウンを\n ウェルカムハウスに 設定しますか？\n<yesno:
So, do you want to set up this My Town as a
welcome house?<yesno><break>

247176.「これより 『マイタウンへの出入り』と\n 『家への出入り』が できるのは\n:
From now on, anyone can go in and out of My
Town, and anyone can go in and out of my
house...<bw_break>

247530.『他の人の家へ』を使えば\nウェルカムハウス設定にしている誰かの家の前に\nひと:
With "Go to Other People's Houses," you can jump right in front of anyone's house that's set up as a welcome home! However, you don't
know which house you're going to... However, you can't tell which house you're going to... the place you're going to changes every time,
so try it again and again to visit different houses.

248272.「これより\n 『マイタウンへの出入り』が できるのは\n 『だれでもОＫ』にな:
From now on, anyone can enter and leave My
Town...<bw_break>

248273.「ウェルカムハウスに 設定すると\n たくさんの人が このマイタウンの家を見つけ:
If you set up a welcome house, many people may find your house in My Town and come to visit you... In the Welcome House, you can
set up points of self-confidence in your house, and for each self-confidence point, you can select the house you want to fly
to... In My Town, you can jump to the house you've set as your Welcome House by selecting a theme from the door menu of each house, or
from outside of My Town, from Listea, the land manager, or from the support staff standing at the entrance of each residential
village. If you set up a welcome house, balloons will be placed on the sign outside your house so that other people can easily
see you... When I set up a Welcome House, it automatically sets the "Access to My Town" and "Access to My House" to "Anyone Can... Be
careful when setting permissions on furniture and garden tools...

250982.遊びにいきたいマイタウンの\n家のテーマを選択してください。\n<break>:
Select the theme of the house in My Town you
want to visit...<break>

251660.「申し訳ございません。別宅では\n 『モーモンバザー』の 設定はできませんので\:
I'm sorry... I can't set up the Mormon Bazaar
at my other house, so please set it up at my
house...<bw_break>
